channel.title: Rock Springs|Sweetwater County|Wyoming|United States on Roadsign Pictures
channel.description: Recent content in Rock Springs|Sweetwater County|Wyoming|United States on Roadsign Pictures

item.title: I-80 East - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance marker on I-80 east. Distance to Wamsutter and Cheyenne.

item.title: I-80 East - Exit 107
item.description: I-80 east approaching Exit 107 - To WY-430/Pilot Butte Ave. This is the eastern end of the Rock Springs business loop.

item.title: I-80 East - Exit 104
item.description: I-80/US-30 East/US-191 North at Exit 104 - US-191 North/Elk St. Continue east on I-80/US-30 for Rawlins.

item.title: I-80 West - Exit 104 Offramp
item.description: US-191 South at I-80/US-30 (Exit 104). Use I-80/US-30 West to Green River. Use I-80/US-30 East to Rawlins.

item.title: US-191 South Approaching I-80/US-191
item.description: US-191 South approaching I-80/US-191 in Rock Springs. Use I-80 West/US-30 West/US-191 South to Green River.

item.title: US-191 South - Rock Springs
item.description: Entering Rock Springs on US-191 south. Population 23036 / Elevation 6271 Feet. Rock Springs is the 5th largest city in Wyoming based on the 2010 census.

item.title: BL-80 West at I-80/US-30 West/US-191 South
item.description: BL-80 West (Dewar Drive) at I-80/US-30 West/US-191 South to Green River. This is the western end of the Rock Springs business loop.

item.title: I-80 West - Exit 104
item.description: I-80 west at Exit 104 - US-191 North/Elk St. Continue straight for I-80/US-30 West (and US-191 South) to Salt Lake (Utah). US-191 south joins I-80 west through Rock Springs.

item.title: WY-376 East at WY-430 South
item.description: WY-376 East (South Side Belt Route) at WY-430 South.

item.title: WY-376 East Approaching WY-430
item.description: WY-376 East (South Side Belt Route) approaching WY-430 south.

item.title: I-80 East - Exits 102 and 104
item.description: I-80 East at Exit 102 - BL-80/Bus. US-30/Dewar Drive. Next exit is College Drive which is unsigned on this assembly. The exit after that is Exit 104 - US-191 North/Elk St. I-80/US-30 continues east towards Cheyenne.

item.title: I-80 East Approaching Exit 102
item.description: I-80 east approaching Exit 102. Use Exit 102 for WY-430 south.

item.title: I-80 East - Exit 102
item.description: I-80 east approaching Exit 102 - BL-80/Rock Springs.

item.title: I-80 West - Exit 107 and Exit 104
item.description: I-80 west at Exit 104 - BL-80/Business US-30/To WY-430/Pilot Butte Ave. Approaching Exit 104 - US-191 North/Elk St. I-80/US-30 continues west towards Green River. This is the western end of the Rock Springs business loop.

item.title: I-80 West - Exit 102
item.description: I-80 west at Exit 102 - Dewar Drive. This is the western end of the Rock Springs business loop.

item.title: I-80 West - Exit 104
item.description: I-80 west at Exit 104 - US-191 North/Elk St. US-191 south joins I-80 to Green River.

item.title: BL-80/Bus. US-30 East at I-80/US-30 West
item.description: BL-80/Bus. US-30 East at I-80/US-30 west towards Green River. This is the onramp for Exit 107.

item.title: BL-80/Bus. US-30 East at I-80/US-30
item.description: BL-80/Bus. US-30 East at I-80/US-30 (Exit 107 onramp). Use I-80/US-30 East for Rawlins. Use I-80/US-30 West for Green River.

item.title: BL-80/Bus. US-30 East at WY-376
item.description: BL-80/Bus. US-30 East at WY-376/To WY-430. WY-376 is the Rock Springs Belt Line, which loops across the south side of town.

item.title: BL-80/Bus. US-30 East at Elk St.
item.description: BL-80/Bus. US-30 East at Elk St. in downtown Rock Springs. Use Elk St. north for US-191 to Pinedale and I-80. Continue east on BL-80/Bus. US-30 for Rawlins.

item.title: End WY-430 At WY-376
item.description: End WY-430 at WY-376, the Rock Springs Belt Route. Turn right on WY-376 for I-80 east. Turn left on WY-376 for I-80 west.

item.title: End WY-430 North at WY-376
item.description: End WY-430 north at WY-376

item.title: WY-430 North - To I-80
item.description: WY-430 North (New Hampshire St.) at Marchant St. Turn left on Marchant St. to continue on WY-430, and to reach I-80. WY-430 is incorrectly marked as TO here, when in reality this is a continuation of WY-430.

item.title: WY-430 North To I-80
item.description: WY-430 North (New Hampshire St.) approaching Marchant St. All WY-430 North and I-80 traffic must turn left on Marchant St.

item.title: I-80 West - Exit 104 Offramp
item.description: I-80 west Exit 104 offramp at US-191 (Elk St.). Turn right for US-191 north to Pinedale.

item.title: I-80 West - Exit 104
item.description: I-80 west at Exit 104 - US-191 North/Elk St. Continue straight for I-80/US-30 West (and US-191 South) to Green River.

item.title: I-80 West Approaching Exit 104
item.description: I-80 west - Use US-191 North for Teton - Yellowstone National Parks.

item.title: I-80 West - Exit 107 and Exit 104
item.description: I-80 west at Exit 107 - BL-80/Bus. US-30/To WY-430/Pilot Butte Ave. Approaching Exit 104 - US-191 North/Elk St. I-80/US-30 continue west to Green River.

item.title: I-80 West Approaching Exit 107
item.description: I-80/US-30 west approaching Exit 107 - BL-80/Bus. US-30/To WY-430/PIlot Butte Ave.

item.title: BL-80 East at WY-372/To WY-430
item.description: WY-372/To WY-430 on BL-80 East

item.title: End WY-372 at BL-80
item.description: End WY-372 at BL-80

item.title: I-80 East Exit 102
item.description: I-80 East at Exit 102 - BL-80/Rock Springs. Next exit is College Drive which is unsigned. The exit after that is Exit 104 - US-191 North/Elk St. I-80/US-30 continues east towards Rawlins.

item.title: I-80 East Exit 104
item.description: I-80 East at US-191 North Junction

item.title: WY-372 East at BL-80/To I-80/To US-30
item.description: To I-80/To US-30 on WY-372 East
